articles.content: With interest rates still at very low levels, it continues to be a difficult period for income investors. The good news is there are plenty of ASX dividend shares that can help you overcome low rates… [+1900 chars]

articles.author: Matthew Perrone
articles.title: Merck’s COVID-19 pill less effective than first reported - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: If authorised, Merck’s pill would be the first that doctors could prescribe for patients to take on their own to ease symptoms and speed recovery.
articles.content:
Another question is whether pregnant women or women of child-bearing age should avoid the drug.
FDA scientists said that company studies in rats showed the drug caused toxicity and birth defects in … [+2753 chars]
